work.name: Brookings Institution
work.summary: Web-scraped 500+ congressional candidates in preparation for the midterm primaries. Coded and categorized each candidate along 43 variables 17 demographic and 26 about party position

work.name: Zoom

work.name: ACLU
work.summary: Combined legal and quantitative analyses to mitigate racial gerrymandering of the Black Voting Age Population in Georgia. Applied two key algorithms, Sequential Monte Carlo Algorithm and Markov Chain Adaptations to simulate fair redistricting
